page.title: 18A Day in the Life
page.content: First its getting up. Mum shouts hurry up, you'll be late for school.I have to wash and get dressed before breakfast.When breakfast has finished its off to school.When we get in class first its registration then its Maths up until playtime.We go on the field until we have to go in.When we get in class two people are working on the computer while the others are doing English.After dinner we do some reading.When we do games we play stoolball, rounders, cricket, athletics and softball. After play we have a story or drama,word games or four in a row,which is a number game. Then its home time.When I get home I watch television until tea time after which I play cricket or tennis with my sister.On schooldays 8.30 p.m. is my bedtime although at weekends I stay up a little later.
